official_title: To amend section 203 of the National Housing Act to increase the maximum mortgage amount limitation under the single family housing mortgage insurance program of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for homes in nonhigh-cost areas.

summary.text: FHA Mortgage Upgrade Act - Amends the National Housing Act to revise single family housing insurance mortgage limitations.
